comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: The screenshot you link shows the Mode column, are you asking to have more whitespace for that?  Would help if you could say what you want it to look like compared to what it looks like today.

comments.author: rkeithhill
comments.body:
If you can use the [Windows Terminal preview](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/windows-terminal-preview/9n0dx20hk701), it allows you to adjust the padding. By default, I think the padding is 8 pixels:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5177512/70471774-1e56c200-1a8b-11ea-854b-b7ef31887c4a.png)

Here I have adjusted it up to 15 pixels:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5177512/70471904-5bbb4f80-1a8b-11ea-8bdd-f013fecd2814.png)

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @iftkharhussain I see, so you would like some whitespace on the left side of the table?  The downside will be using up one character that could be used for wider tables that already truncate columns.  @rkeithhill's suggestion seems like a good solution.
